colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA JO NANG PE LI'I SHOG DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS PA DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGE BA 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
